original_text: “They are to take a blue cloth and cover the lampstand that is for light, together with its lamps, its wick trimmers and trays, and all its jars for the olive oil used to supply it.
korean_text: 청색 보자기를 취하여 등잔대와 등잔들과 불 집게들과 불똥 그릇들과 그 쓰는 바 모든 기름 그릇을 덮고

sentences.original_text: They are to take a blue cloth
and cover the lampstand that is for light
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 빛을 위한 등대를 덮어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: and all its jars for the olive oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 올리브유를 담는 모든 항아리들과 함께
